name: Space Hulk: Venegance of the Blood Angels
name_original: Space Hulk: Venegance of the Blood Angels
description:
Space Hulk: Venegance of the Blood Angels is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Games Workshop and Key Game. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Space Hulk: Venegance of the Blood Angels is available on PC, SEGA Saturn, PlayStation and 3DO.
It was scored by James Hannigan.
